LanguageData.Battery_Once.label: disposable battery
LanguageData.Battery_Once.description: A cheap disposable battery,destroy when it runs out of power.
LanguageData.LingBrainPower.label: Mental reactor
LanguageData.LingBrainPower.description: A device that produces energy by aggregating the human mind can produce a lot of energy through the collision of minds, which some people find extremely inhumane. But in principle, this device is neither living nor contains life.
LanguageData.LingEasyBoomPower.label: antigrain generator
LanguageData.LingEasyBoomPower.description: A device that disassembers antigrain shells and uses the antigrain to generate electricity slowly releases the energy from the antigrain instead of detonating it directly.
LanguageData.LingEndLessPower.label: endless reactor
LanguageData.LingEndLessPower.description: A device that generates electricity through a mechanical structure can expand the structure and increase its power generation capacity through continuous input of advanced components.
LanguageData.RawPotatoesGenerator.label: potato generator
LanguageData.RawPotatoesGenerator.description: A generator that uses potatoes to generate electricity can break down potatoes at high speeds. It has almost three times the space utilization of contemporary generators, but the corresponding potato consumption rate is also extremely fast.
LanguageData.SubcoreRegularGenerator.label: Cognitive furnace
LanguageData.SubcoreRegularGenerator.description: A device that generates electricity by analyzing the human mind, but cannot directly use a complete human being, needs to print cognition into standard subcore through subcore softscanner before it can be used in this device.
LanguageData.ZeroTechInfiniteBattery.label: hyperspace battery
LanguageData.ZeroTechInfiniteBattery.description: A low-intensity battery, in essence, is a transmission device, when the energy is greater than 998wd will transmit energy, less than 50Wd back, theory can store unlimited energy, but the efficiency of energy storage will gradually weaken with the amount of energy storage.
